revised_title: The Effects of X-Rays on Inflammatory Lesions and Tumor Formation
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on rabbits to study the effects of X-rays on inflammatory lesions. They found that X-ray exposure to inflamed tissues could lead to tumor formation in some cases. This research highlights the importance of understanding the potential risks and benefits of X-ray therapy for treating various conditions.
